content.question: Which of the following is common feature of the illustrated reactions showing the linking of monomers to form macromolecules?

choices.label: Two identical monomers are joined by a covalent bond.
Two different monomers are joined by a covalent bond.
Monomers are joined by a covalent bond, and a water molecule is produced.
Monomers are joined by ionic bonds, and a water molecule is produced.

content.answer: Monomers are joined by a covalent bond, and a water molecule is produced.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
